name: YASMPWRT
description:
YASMPWRT

Yet another stupid monochrome platformer with rewind time.

Over 10 levels you need to find the key and open the door.

This is a project for  Brackeys Jam 2020.2. This is my first completed project and first GameJam experience.

Control scheme

Run: WASD or Arrow

Jump: Space

Rewind: R

Credits

Designed, programmed by me

Arts, music, SFX by Kenney

Made with Unity

Known issues

- all bugs are not bugs, they are features 😁 Just kidding.

Source Code

https://github.com/GolfNorth/YASMPWRT
